name: Craftsman's Writ - Wicked Leather Headband
tooltip:
Craftsman's Writ - Wicked Leather Headband

Deliver 10 Wicked Leather Headbands and the Craftsman's Writ - Wicked Leather Headband - to Packmaster Stonebruiser at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

Requirements:
- Wicked Leather Headband x 10
